p1: I was born and raised in Saudi. For the past few years, I've been living in ðŸ—½NYCðŸ—½ where I work as a software engineer with the most incredible team @{shopifyLink}. I'm passionate about technology and science and think that their advancement of opens so many possiblities of making the world a better, more just place {fist}
p2: Besides work, I love the company of wonderful friends which make New York City feel like a small town. Covid has showed me how impactful mutual aid is and the power of unity & solidarity in community
p3: I spend a lot of time around books/music/films as well as being out in nature. The highest I've climbed is ~6,000 meters and I haven't caved very deep, but hope to do soon! I also bike everywhere, sometimes to other countries {wink}
p4: The majority of my worldviews and personality come from experinces I've had whilst travelling. I'm like that person with an accent and face you can't seem to place, like in ~7 or so languages {smile}
p5: I don't use social media, but would love to connect over email, my email is saleh@alghusson.com
